title: The Captain and Mad Dog
description:
Jessica and June are on their own again but they live in fear that Paul Scheer could bust in on them at any moment. The girls dive deep into the shame of being late and how they deal with the nervousness that comes with doing something difficult. Then we get an update on the hair, make-up, and the lights of it all from The Today Show appearance, Jessica gets a special delivery and discovers that yes, there are enough fish sticks in the house. Deep Divers, we want to know what your dream refrigerator accoutrements are!

You can follow The Deep Dive on Twitter @thedeepdivepod

June Diane Raphael @MsJuneDiane on Twitter @junediane on Instagram

Jessica St. Clair @Jessica_StClair on Twitter @stclairjessica on Instagram

Email us at thedeepdive@earwolf.com

Check out the Jane Club at www.janeclub.com
author: thedeepdive@earwolf.com (June Diane Rapheal, Earwolf & Jessica St. Clair)
